entry.title: 文章标题1.1
entry.content: 描述这是文章1.1本文是关于【静动画测试】，详情请看下面。 静态图片1使用格式一：![](image.jpg) 1使用格式二：>{% asset_img 静态.jpg 静态图片预览 %} 动态图片1使用格式一：>![](动态.gif) 1使用格式二：>{% asset_img 动态.gif 动态图片预览 %}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. 1.Quick Start1.1Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing 1.2Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server 1.3Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating 1.4Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy 2.Add chapterSave content More info: Deployment
